attributes.action: Keep pretty little liars on for more than 7 seasons.
attributes.additional_details: Many people would be so upset and heartbroken that it is finishing, and would want more from the show.. It is such a great programme! It's got something for everyone in it. Love. Drama. Mystery. Death. Suspense.! It can't just end at season 7!
attributes.background: Pretty little liars is such an amazing show, that it should never end, no matter how tedious it would get, but it should at least go on for more than 7 seasons! The first six and a half seasons were dedicates to one 'bady' and now there's only going to be one and a half seasons for one 'bady'.
